index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND HUMAN SERVICES
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Weed and Seed Program; authorizing execution of agreements with the United States Department of Justice and the United States Department of Justice, Federal Bureau of Investigation; accepting the money when received; increasing expenditure allowances in the 1994 budgets of the Police Department, Health Department, Department of Parks and Recreation and Department of Housing and Human Services for the continuation of Weed and Seed Programs; making reimbursable appropriations from the Emergency Fund Supplemental Appropriation Subfund; and declaring the emergency therefor; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
